Question
========
What kind of resource are the “R Primers” mentioned in this unit?

Answerlist
----------
* A mailing list for R job postings
* A set of interactive tutorials covering basic R concepts
* An R package for plotting
* A conference about R hardware

Solution
========
The R Primers are interactive tutorials that walk through foundational R coding topics.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* True
* False
* False
